article:
A couple  have a son and a daughter, and they are twins. They live in a _ near Nanjing. Their house is very small with only three rooms. No washing machine, and no _ to keep food in.
The twins are _ students. They are in the  _  grade this year. They must do a lot of homework at home. But they don't have a  _ . They have to do their homework at the dining table. Every morning, they go to school on one bike. And when they are _  from school, they do a lot of housework for their parents.
They live a hard life. But the family is always _ of fun. They often sit on their old sofa and  chat  about school life and the children's beautiful future there.
The family becomes famous _  it donates  2,000 Yuan to Project Hope. When people ask them why they are so generous , the father always says, "We know _  people feel when their children can't go to school."
